entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:53 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
